Class CareerStaffView

Object
CareerStaffView
public class CareerStaffView extends Object
View class for Career Staff interface. VIEW LAYER: Responsible ONLY for displaying information and getting user input. - Shows menus and data - Formats output - Gets user input DOES NOT contain business logic.
